TopicTitle: MythKerbals - Myth Videos every other day! Send yours in!

Articles.Content:
LATEST VIDEO:

Welcome to MythKerbals! We bust myths every other day! Here in MythKerbals,We bust any Myths here at the KSC.

Yes,we are that mysterious building.

Just kidding.Anyway! ENJOY! Our credentials will be below to contact us!

CREDENTIALS:

Email (Send Us Your Myths!):[email protected]

Youtube (Where our videos are!): Myth Kerbals

NEWS:

No episode,going to movie.

Edited July 25, 2013 by BigBoy734
I'm looking forward to the first video!

I'm looking forward to the first video!

Woohoo! First Commenter! And thanks! We will make our own myths based off other videos. (Well,IF no one sends a myth...)
This is more asking a question. How many struts does it take to keep absurdly huge and heavy rockets from breaking their connection to the launch stability inhancers.
Does landing on the dark side of Moho actually help?
Is there an 'ideal' landing spot on any planet, and is it possible to get plasma-shock on kerbin below 10 km?

Is there an 'ideal' landing spot on any planet, and is it possible to get plasma-shock on kerbin below 10 km?

Scott Manley has already busted the last of these in a video he did on the rods from the gods mod. He sent one of those rods straight down, and once it passed 10k, it IMMEDIATELY switched from plasma-shock to condensation, despite the absurd velocity of the rod.
Do SAS units really add more torque power?

Do SAS units really add more torque power?

This will be yes in the next update. Until then, it's a proven no, but a good thing to cover.
I knew that, but then again, I also knew that a toy racecar going downhill does not in fact go faster than an actual car. (That was proven busted.)
Also,This part is just for comments,If you don't have an email,feel free to put your myth here,but if you have an email,please contact our fanmail.
Is it possible to do a burn from Moho to Eeloo using under 15 km/s of delta v?

Also,This part is just for comments,If you don't have an email,feel free to put your myth here,but if you have an email,please contact our fanmail.

Some people don't want to use email for privacy reasons (myself included).

Some people don't want to use email for privacy reasons (myself included).

Like I said you can post here if you really want to.
Myth idea: Is it possible to get to the Mun using only RCS? Or only SRBs?
Second Episode Up! If your ready for the kraken,go ahead and watch!
